attributes.action: Force British Industry Laying Off staff to remove foreign workers first
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The British Govt should force British Industry to first remove foreign workers before laying off any British staff. 

Thus people under work-permits should go first
Then people on a dependent visa
Then people who are having permenant residency and EU (non-british) residency
Then if there is still need then it should touch the Britisher's
